entries: The Guild Wars franchise is the flagship franchise of the Washington state based development studio ArenaNet.
The tenth entry into it's now 20 year old story is Guild Wars 2 Path of Fire.
This book aims to capture the story and the feelings of this beloved game, and bring them to the gaming table with the help of the Dungeons & Dragons 5 edition rule set.
All credit goes to the amazing people at ArenaNet and NCSoft, who have given us players such magical adventures.

optionalfeature.name: Deadeye's Gaze
entries: Steal is replaced with Deadeye's Mark, which unlocks new Stolen skills and malice generation. Stealth attacks consume malice for bonus effects. Gain access to rifles and cantrips.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Intent
entries: Marking a target or striking your mark with a stealth attack will immediately grant malice.

optionalfeature.name: Collateral Damage
entries: Trigger Burst of Shadows at your target's location if it dies while marked.

optionalfeature.name: One in the Chamber
entries: When you cast a cantrip, gain a random new stolen skill. Stolen skills deal more damage. (Requires a marked target. Overwrites existing stolen skills.)

optionalfeature.name: Renewing Gaze
entries: Deadeye's Mark recharges if your mark is defeated. Gain regeneration when this recharge occurs.

optionalfeature.name: Silent Scope
entries: Gain precision. Gain additional precision while wielding a rifle. Enter stealth when you dodge roll with a rifle equipped.

optionalfeature.name: Payback
entries: When Renewing Gaze triggers, this trait restores a portion of the recharge time needed by your healing, utility, and elite skills. Excludes racial skills.

optionalfeature.name: Premeditation
entries: Deal increased strike damage for each unique boon you have; concentration is increased.

optionalfeature.name: Iron Sight
entries: Strike damage dealt to your marked target is increased, and strike damage taken from your marked target is reduced.

optionalfeature.name: Maleficent Seven
entries: Increase the maximum malice-stack count. Restore initiative and gain boons upon reaching the maximum number of malice stacks.

optionalfeature.name: Be Quick or Be Killed
entries: Gain quickness when marking a foe. Your power and precision are increased while under this effect.

optionalfeature.name: Fire for Effect
entries: Using a stolen skill grants additional boons to allies around you. Stolen skills will always be Steal Time, regardless of the target's profession.

optionalfeature.name: Brutal Aim
entries: {@b Description:} Fire a shot that inflicts vulnerability on your target. Applies additional vulnerability when used against your marked target.

optionalfeature.name: Deadly Aim
entries: {@b Description:} Kneel. Fire a shot that inflicts vulnerability on your target. Applies additional vulnerability against your marked target.

optionalfeature.name: Death's Judgment
entries: {@b Casting Time:} Bonus Action or Action
{@b Description:} Stealth Attack. Reveal yourself and fire a powerful shot at your target.

optionalfeature.name: Skirmisher's Shot
entries: {@b Casting Time:} Bonus Action or Action
{@b Description:} Fire a bullet that inflicts conditions on your target and grants you a boon.

optionalfeature.name: Spotter's Shot
entries: {@b Description:} Kneel. Fire a bullet that grants you boons and inflicts conditions on your target.

optionalfeature.name: Double Tap
entries: {@b Description:} Fire two bullets that grant might if they hit your target.

optionalfeature.name: Three Round Burst
entries: {@b Description:} Kneel. Fire three bullets that grant might if they hit your target.

optionalfeature.name: Death's Retreat
entries: {@b Description:} Shadowstep away from your target and lose conditions. Poisons foes at your starting location.

optionalfeature.name: Sniper's Cover
entries: {@b Description:} Kneel. Create a barrier of shadows that blocks incoming missiles. Kneeling while within the barrier allows you to use Death's Advance.

optionalfeature.name: Death's Advance
entries: {@b Description:} Kneel. Shadowstep forward while granting yourself stealth.

optionalfeature.name: Kneel
entries: {@b Casting Time:} Bonus Action or Action

{@b Description:} Your base and maximum movement speed is reduced. Gain access to kneel skills, which have increased projectile velocity. You can still dodge roll while kneeling. Kneeling is canceled if you swap weapons or use Free Action.

optionalfeature.name: Free Action
entries: {@b Description:} Kneel. Stop kneeling and move freely. If you used at least one kneel skill, gain swiftness.

optionalfeature.name: Deadeye's Mark
entries: {@b Casting Time:} Bonus Action or Action

{@b Description:} Mark a target, causing your initiative attacks to generate malice when they hit or critically hit your mark. Lose all malice when the mark ends or when this skill is recast on a new target.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Restoration
entries: {@b Description:} Transfer your conditions to your marked target and then heal yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Binding Shadow
entries: {@b Description:} Reveal yourself if you are stealthed and remove boons from your target after a short delay.
{@b Effect:} If the foe is your marked target, they are also immobilized.

optionalfeature.name: Mercy
entries: {@b Description:} Lose all malice, instantly refresh Deadeye's Mark, and gain initiative.
{@b Effect:} Gain additional initiative for each stack of malice you had prior to using this skill.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Flare
entries: {@b Description:} Throw an orb of shadow magic that damages nearby foes at your targeted location.
{@b Effect:} You may reactivate this skill to swap places with the orb. Deals increased damage to your marked target.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Swap
entries: {@b Description:} Swap places with your shadow flare, causing it to detonate and deal damage to enemies at your original location.
{@b Effect:} Deals increased damage to your marked target.

optionalfeature.name: Shadow Gust
entries: {@b Description:} Knock away nearby foes with a burst of shadow magic, then stealth yourself.
{@b Effect:} If this skill hits your marked target, they'll be launched instead.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Cunning Salvo
entries: {@b Description:} Throw an axe that explodes when it hits a target, crippling nearby enemies. Gain initiative if you strike an enemy.
{@b Effect:} Consumes all malice when striking your mark to inflict poison with a duration equal to the consumed malice.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Backstab
entries: {@b Description:} Attack your foe from the shadows and strike for double the damage if you hit from behind or they are defiant.
{@b Effect:} Consumes all malice when striking your mark to deal bonus damage.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Sneak Attack
entries: {@b Description:} Sneak attack with a rapid fire from your pistol that makes your foe bleed.
{@b Effect:} Consumes all malice when striking your mark to inflict torment with a duration equal to twice the consumed malice.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Death's Judgment
entries: {@b Description:} Reveal yourself and fire a powerful shot at your target.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Shadowsquall
entries: {@b Description:} From the shadows, unleash a barrage towards your target.
{@b Effect:} If this attack hits your mark, it consumes all malice and increases the duration of poison it applies.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Surprise Shot
entries: {@b Description:} Shoot an arrow that bleeds and immobilizes your foe.
{@b Effect:} If the arrow hits your marked target, it consumes all malice and splinters, firing new arrows at nearby foes for each malice consumed.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Hook Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Attack your foes from stealth, knocking enemies down.
{@b Effect:} If this attack hits your mark, it consumes all malice and grants you quickness.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Tactical Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Daze your foe by bashing them with your sword hilt. Daze them for a longer duration if you attack from behind or they are defiant. Applies vulnerability.
{@b Effect:} Consumes all malice when striking your mark to restore endurance based on the malice used.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Ashen Assault
entries: {@b Description:} Attack foes in front of you with a series of strikes, making them vulnerable. The final strike inflicts damaging conditions.
{@b Effect:} If this skill follows a Finisher skill, it grants initiative. Consumes all malice when striking your mark to inflict torment and increase the damage dealt.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Ripper
entries: {@b Description:} Fire a shot while in stealth to bleed your target.
{@b Effect:} Consumes all malice when striking your mark to add additional bleeding stacks.

optionalfeature.name: Malicious Deadly Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Attack while in stealth, bleeding and weakening your target.
{@b Effect:} Consumes all malice to deal bonus damage if it strikes your mark.

optionalfeature.name: Spellbreaker's Conviction

prerequisite.other: Access to the Spellbreaker Elite Specialization.

entries: Maximum adrenaline is capped at 2 bars, and only level 1 bursts are available. Gain access to the Full Counter skill and Meditation skills.

optionalfeature.name: Pure Strike
entries: Deal increased critical-hit damage. This bonus is doubled against boonless foes.

optionalfeature.name: Guard Counter
entries: Gain protection after a successful Full Counter.

optionalfeature.name: Dispelling Force

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Pure Strike|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature Guard Counter|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature No Escape|GW2PoF}

entries: Dazes, stuns, pulls, knockdowns, knockbacks, and launches remove boons.

optionalfeature.name: Loss Aversion
entries: Removing boons from a foe deals damage and gives you adrenaline.

optionalfeature.name: Slow Counter
entries: Full Counter applies cripple and slow. Gain boons for each dagger you equip.

optionalfeature.name: Sun and Moon Style
entries: Main hand—Strike damage is increased versus foes with no boons. Off Hand—Heal for a percent of your outgoing strike damage.

optionalfeature.name: Attacker's Insight

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Loss Aversion|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature Slow Counter|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature Sun and Moon Style|GW2PoF}

entries: Gain insight when disabling foes or removing boons. Full Counter refreshes all burst skills on hit. Disables include stun, daze, knockback, pull, knockdown, sink, float, launch, taunt, and fear.

optionalfeature.name: Enchantment Collapse
entries: Removing a boon from a foe causes all nearby foes to lose additional boons.

optionalfeature.name: Revenge Counter
entries: Full Counter deals additional damage and grants resistance. Copy conditions on yourself to targets you hit with Full Counter.

optionalfeature.name: Magebane Tether
entries: Hitting with a burst skill casts Magebane Tether on your target if they are within range.

optionalfeature.name: Full Counter
entries: {@b Properties:} Burst, Absorb Attack, Counterattack, Interrupt
{@b Description:} Burst. Absorb the next attack against you and counterattack all foes around you. Foes struck by the counter attack are interrupted.

optionalfeature.name: Natural Healing
entries: {@b Properties:} Meditation, Lose Boons, Lose Conditions, Heal
{@b Description:} Meditation. Lose boons and conditions, then heal yourself.

optionalfeature.name: Sight beyond Sight
entries: {@b Properties:} Meditation, Reveals Stealth, Critical Hit, Removes Blindness, Removes Conditions
{@b Description:} Meditation. Reveal nearby foes and make your next attack a critical hit. Remove blindness and nondamaging conditions.

optionalfeature.name: Featherfoot Grace
entries: {@b Properties:} Meditation, Grants Superspeed, Grants Resistance
{@b Description:} Meditation. Gain a burst of superspeed and resistance.

optionalfeature.name: Imminent Threat
entries: {@b Properties:} Meditation, Taunt, Grants Adrenaline, Grants Barrier
{@b Description:} Meditation. Taunt nearby foes, gaining adrenaline and barrier for each affected foe.

optionalfeature.name: Break Enchantments
entries: {@b Properties:} Meditation, Damage, Remove Boon, Damage Scaling
{@b Description:} Meditation. Strike foes around you and remove their boons. Deal more damage to foes that lose a boon.

optionalfeature.name: Winds of Disenchantment
entries: {@b Properties:} Meditation, Reduced Boon Duration, Remove Boon, Projectile Block
{@b Description:} Meditation. Create an area of calm in which foes have reduced incoming boon duration and lose boons every interval. Enemy missiles entering this area are blocked.

optionalfeature.name: Breaching Strike
entries: {@b Properties:} Burst, Remove Boon, Increased Damage (No Boons)
{@b Description:} Burst. Strike your target and remove boons. Deal more damage if your target has no boons. Effect increases with adrenaline level.

optionalfeature.name: Precise Cut
entries: {@b Description:} Chain. Strike your foe. This attack deals increased critical damage.

optionalfeature.name: Focused Slash

prerequisite.other: Requires Dagger. Must follow Precise Cut.

entries: {@b Description:} Chain. Strike your foe. This attack has increased critical-hit damage.

optionalfeature.name: Keen Strike

prerequisite.other: Requires Dagger. Must follow Focused Slash.

entries: {@b Properties:} Chain, Grants Might (on critical hit)
{@b Description:} Chain. Strike your foe and gain might. Gain additional might on critical hit.

optionalfeature.name: Aura Slicer
entries: {@b Description:} Leap and strike your foe, inflicting slow.

optionalfeature.name: Disrupting Stab
entries: {@b Properties:} Daze, Extended Daze (on skill use)
{@b Description:} Dazes your target. If your target is using a skill, the daze duration is extended.

optionalfeature.name: Wastrel's Ruin
entries: {@b Properties:} Remove Boon, Increased Damage (Not using skills)
{@b Description:} Strike your target and remove boons. Damage and boon removal are increased against foes not using skills.

optionalfeature.name: Bladestorm
entries: {@b Properties:} Damage, Reflects Projectiles, Grants Barrier
{@b Description:} Unleash a flurry of attacks that damages foes and reflects projectiles coming from the front. Gain barrier when striking a foe.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Build elemental flames into your sword and strike your enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Fire Swipe

prerequisite.other: Sword (Fire Attunement). Must follow Fire Strike.

entries: {@b Description:} Heat your sword a second time and strike your enemies for increased damage.

optionalfeature.name: Searing Slash

prerequisite.other: Sword (Fire Attunement). Must follow Fire Swipe.

entries: {@b Description:} Heat your sword a final time and use the full power of your flames to sear enemies and ignite them.

optionalfeature.name: Flame Uprising
entries: {@b Description:} Jump forward and deliver a fiery blast to the area.

optionalfeature.name: Cauterizing Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Stab your foe with full force, dealing bonus damage against burning enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Seiche

prerequisite.other: Elementalist in Water Attunement wielding a Sword

entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Chain|GW2|Chain:} {@optfeature Seiche|GW2PoF} -> {@optfeature Clapotis|GW2PoF} -> {@optfeature Breaking Wave|GW2PoF}, Water Attunement
{@b Description:} Imbue your blade with water, healing yourself for each target you strike.

{@b Effect:} Choose up to 3 creatures within 5 feet of you. Make a melee attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 1d6} cold damage, and you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d6}.
{@b Scaling:} The damage and healing increases by {@damage 1d6} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 2d6}), 11 ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Clapotis

prerequisite.other: Elementalist in Water Attunement wielding a Sword. Must follow Seiche.

entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Chain|GW2|Chain:} {@optfeature Seiche|GW2PoF} -> {@optfeature Clapotis|GW2PoF} -> {@optfeature Breaking Wave|GW2PoF}, Water Attunement
{@b Description:} Deliver a second strike that heals yourself for each target it hits.

{@b Effect:} Choose up to 3 creatures within 5 feet of you. Make a melee attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 1d6} cold damage, and you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d6}.
{@b Scaling:} The damage and healing increases by {@damage 1d6} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 2d6}), 11 ({@damage 3d6}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d6}).

optionalfeature.name: Breaking Wave

prerequisite.other: Elementalist in Water Attunement wielding a Sword

entries: {@b Properties:} {@variantrule Chain|GW2|Chain:} {@optfeature Seiche|GW2PoF} -> {@optfeature Clapotis|GW2PoF} -> {@optfeature Breaking Wave|GW2PoF}, Water Attunement
{@b Description:} Strike your enemies and unleash a wave that heals allies.

{@b Effect:} Choose one creature within 5 feet of you. Make a melee attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8} cold damage and each ally within 10 feet of you regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + class ability modifier.
{@b Scaling:} The damage and healing increases by {@damage 1d8} when you reach levels 5 ({@damage 2d8}), 11 ({@damage 3d8}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d8}).

optionalfeature.name: Riptide
entries: {@b Properties:} Water, Propel, Regenerate, Healing Field
{@b Description:} Use the element of water to propel yourself backward and regenerate, leaving a healing area at your location.

optionalfeature.name: Aqua Siphon
entries: {@b Description:} Strike an enemy and draw water from them, causing them to deliver a healing burst to your allies.

optionalfeature.name: Charged Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Strike your foe with shocking force.

optionalfeature.name: Polaric Slash

prerequisite.other: Sword (Air Attunement). Must follow Charged Strike.

entries: {@b Description:} Deliver a second strike, gaining swiftness.

optionalfeature.name: Call Lightning

prerequisite.other: Sword (Air Attunement). Must follow Polaric Slash.

entries: {@b Description:} Deliver the final attack, calling lightning strikes onto enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Polaric Leap
entries: {@b Description:} Shadowstep to your target and deliver a dazing strike. Gain superspeed if you interrupt an enemy.

optionalfeature.name: Quantum Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Strike your foe, charging them with static and causing lightning to strike repeatedly for a short period of time.

optionalfeature.name: Crystal Slash
entries: {@b Description:} Strike your opponent with your serrated blade.

optionalfeature.name: Crystalline Strike

prerequisite.other: Sword (Earth Attunement). Must follow Crystal Slash.

entries: {@b Description:} Attack enemies with a second vicious strike.

optionalfeature.name: Crystalline Sunder

prerequisite.other: Sword (Earth Attunement). Must follow Crystalline Strike.

entries: {@b Description:} Unleash a final crushing blow.

optionalfeature.name: Earthen Vortex
entries: {@b Description:} Burrow into the ground, then erupt with earth-shattering force.

optionalfeature.name: Rust Frenzy
entries: {@b Description:} Strike your enemies with deadly force.

optionalfeature.name: Steam Surge
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Slide to an area, blasting foes with steam while healing nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Plasma Burst
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Inflicts Burn, Blast
{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Burn your foes within a plasma blast.

optionalfeature.name: Ashen Blast
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Inflicts Blind, Inflicts Burning
{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Blind your foes with burning ashes.

optionalfeature.name: Katabatic Wind
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Inflicts Chill, Damage
{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Release a frigid wind that damages foes.

optionalfeature.name: Mud Slide
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Trip your foes with mud as you slide past them.

optionalfeature.name: Grinding Stones
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Shred foes with a storm of stones. Take reduced damage while the storm is active.

optionalfeature.name: Fiery Frost
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Launch a fire and ice bolt while evading.

optionalfeature.name: Plasma Beam
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Fire a superheated jet of plasma at your foe.

optionalfeature.name: Fracturing Strike
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Meteor, Explosive, Fire, Earth
{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Call a meteor from the sky that crashes to the ground, creating an eruption of magma.

optionalfeature.name: Glacial Drift
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Whirl air and ice together, sending out a supercooled projectile that chills enemies it strikes.

optionalfeature.name: Stone Tide
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Inflicts Bleeding, Water, Earth
{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Bleed your foe with ice and sharpened stones.

optionalfeature.name: Earthen Synergy
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Smite your enemies with the earth and sky, dealing damage from below and then stunning from above.

optionalfeature.name: Twin Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Quickly strike enemies in front of you with the extreme nature of fire and water.

optionalfeature.name: Pyro Vortex
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Strike enemies in an arc in front of you, creating burning vortexes on enemies you hit.

optionalfeature.name: Lava Skin
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Grants Barrier, Damage
{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Cover yourself in an increasing barrier while dealing damage to nearby enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Shearing Edge
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Form a frozen blade and spin it toward your enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Natural Frenzy
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Unleash a volley of ice and earth at your enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Gale Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Strike your enemies, lifting them and creating cyclones at their locations.

optionalfeature.name: Pressure Blast
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Projectile, Heal, Explosive

{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Send out a vaporous projectile that heals allies it passes through. This projectile violently explodes if it hits the ground or strikes an enemy, healing allies and damaging foes in the area.

optionalfeature.name: Plasma Blast
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Launch a ball of plasma that explodes on impact at your foes.

optionalfeature.name: Pyroclastic Blast
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Launch a molten rock that devastates an area.

optionalfeature.name: Monsoon
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Launch a hurricane in a direction, healing allies and damaging enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Lahar
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Create an area that cripples and damages enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Pile Driver
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. After a short channel, launch a hyper-fast boulder that decimates foes in its path.

optionalfeature.name: Hydrothermal Vent
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Create a thermal vent around your target.

optionalfeature.name: Plasmic Strike
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Quickly heat the area around your enemy, melting defenses.

optionalfeature.name: Molten Burst
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Grants Barrier, Fire, Earth, Explosive
{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Gain a shield of earth, then release a molten burst from your location.

optionalfeature.name: Absolute Zero
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Inflicts Freeze/Chill, Air, Water
{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Send out a supercooled shard that freezes enemies it hits.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Compression
entries: {@b Description:} Dual Attack. Inflict the area around your target with the immense pressures of the earth and sea.

optionalfeature.name: Sodden Swath
entries: {@b Properties:} Dual Attack, Air, Earth, Vortex
{@b Description:} Dual Attack. Launch a twisting earthen vortex at your enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Aquatic Stance
entries: {@b Description:} Stance. Flow like water, gaining endurance. Striking a foe causes water to erupt from them, healing your nearby allies.

optionalfeature.name: Primordial Stance
entries: {@b Properties:} Stance, Channel, Damage, Inflicts Condition
{@b Description:} Stance. Channel the prime elements at their core, dealing damage based on your current attunements. Fully attuning deals the same condition twice.

optionalfeature.name: Stone Resonance
entries: {@b Description:} Stance. Enter an earthen state, gaining barrier periodically over the course of the stance.

optionalfeature.name: Unravel
entries: {@b Properties:} Stance, Grants Boons, Recharge Reduction

{@b Description:} Stance. For a period of time, you forego your weaver training, choosing to fully attune to elements instead. Gain boons based on your primary attunement, and reduce all attunement cooldowns.

optionalfeature.name: Twist of Fate
entries: {@b Description:} Stance. Break stun, then spin and briefly evade attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Weave Self
entries: {@b Properties:} Stance, Recharge Reduction, Perfect Weave

{@b Description:} Stance. Temporarily reduce the recharge time of attunements while gaining bonuses for attuning to new elements. Successfully attuning to all elements ends this stance and grants Perfect Weave.

optionalfeature.name: Tailored Victory
entries: {@b Description:} Release all of your woven elements and end your Weave Self stance, causing gravity itself to unravel around you.

optionalfeature.name: Weaver

prerequisite.other: Access to the Weaver Elite Specialization.

entries: Your active attunement is now applied to your main hand, with the old attunement moving to your off hand. Attunement recharges are reduced. Gain access to Dual Attack and the Stance utility types.

optionalfeature.name: Superior Elements
entries: Dual Attack skills weaken enemies. Attacks against weakened foes have increased critical chance.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Pursuit
entries: Gain superspeed when inflicting conditions on enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Master's Fortitude
entries: Gain increased vitality while wielding a sword. Gain bonus vitality based on a portion of your power and condition damage.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Refreshment

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Superior Elements|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature Elemental Pursuit|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature Master's Fortitude|GW2PoF}

entries: Grant barrier to yourself when using Dual Attack skills.

optionalfeature.name: Weaver's Prowess
entries: Gain increased condition damage and duration for a period of time after attuning to a different element.

optionalfeature.name: Swift Revenge
entries: Gain swiftness when using a Dual Attack. Deal increased strike damage to enemies while under the effects of swiftness or superspeed.

optionalfeature.name: Bolstered Elements
entries: Gain protection when activating a Stance. Activate Lesser Stone Resonance when using an elite skill.

optionalfeature.name: Elemental Polyphony

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Weaver's Prowess|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature Swift Revenge|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature Bolstered Elements|GW2PoF}

entries: Gain attributes based on your current attunement. When dual attuned, gain both benefits.

optionalfeature.name: Elements of Rage
entries: Gain a bonus to all damage dealt for a period of time when attuned to a single element. Gain precision based on a percentage of your vitality.

optionalfeature.name: Woven Stride
entries: Gain swiftness when you are afflicted with inhibiting conditions. When gaining either superspeed or swiftness, also gain regeneration and cleanse a condition. Swiftness has increased effectiveness.

optionalfeature.name: Invigorating Strikes
entries: Gain vigor when using a Dual Attack. Dodge rolling grants a barrier.

optionalfeature.name: Sun Edge
entries: {@b Description:} Strike your foe and inflict vulnerability. This attack deals more damage based on your heat level.

optionalfeature.name: Sun Ripper

prerequisite.other: Requires Sword. Must follow Sun Edge.

entries: {@b Description:} Strike your foe again and inflict vulnerability. This attack deals more damage based on your heat level.

optionalfeature.name: Gleam Saber

prerequisite.other: Requires Sword. Must follow Sun Ripper.

entries: {@b Description:} Unleash a burst of stored energy with your sword and recharge your other sword skills. This attack deals more damage based on your heat level.

optionalfeature.name: Refraction Cutter
entries: {@b Description:} Strike at foes in front of you and launch a blade of light at your target. Launch extra blades based on your heat level. Each blade inflicts conditions.

optionalfeature.name: Radiant Arc
entries: {@b Description:} Leap to your target and create an arc of light that strikes nearby foes. Gain quickness based on your heat level.

optionalfeature.name: Coolant Blast
entries: {@b Description:} Exceed. Heal yourself and chill nearby foes. If you are above the heat threshold when this skill is activated, gain Frost Aura and continue healing for a duration.

optionalfeature.name: Cauterize

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Coolant Blast

entries: {@b Properties:} Exceed, Removes Conditions, Inflicts Burn
{@b Description:} Use a laser to burn off conditions and set yourself on fire for each condition removed. Removes additional conditions if above the heat threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Spectrum Shield
entries: {@b Properties:} Exceed, Break Stun, Grants Stability

{@b Description:} Exceed. Break stun effects and create a holographic shell that reduces incoming damage and grants stability. This skill grants more stability and lasts longer while above the heat threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Flash Spark

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Spectrum Shield

entries: {@b Properties:} Exceed, Inflicts Blind, Grants Light Aura
{@b Description:} Release a blinding burst of light from your holographic emitter. While above the heat threshold, gain light aura.

optionalfeature.name: Hard Light Arena
entries: {@b Properties:} Exceed, Grants Boons, Grants Barrier

{@b Description:} Exceed. Create a holographic arena that grants you boons while inside of it. When activated above the heat threshold, the radius is increased and the user is granted barrier. Allies gain boons at reduced duration.

optionalfeature.name: Prismatic Singularity

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Hard Light Arena

entries: {@b Description:} Collapse a ring of holograms to pull foes into a single point. The ring explodes when it fully collapses. Radius and pull distance increased while above the heat threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Laser Disk
entries: {@b Description:} Exceed. Create rotating laser blades to damage nearby foes. This skill has increased duration when activated while above the heat threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Blade Burst

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Laser Disk

entries: {@b Description:} Fire holographic blades at foes within range. Damage increased while over the heat threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Photon Wall
entries: {@b Description:} Exceed. A defensive barrier appears in front of you that blocks you and your allies from incoming attacks. Reactivate Exceed to fire the barrier at foes as an attack. This skill grants projectile reflection if you are above the heat threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Launch Wall

prerequisite.other: Tool Belt Skill for Photon Wall

entries: {@b Description:} Exceed. Launch your photon wall forward, causing the wall to explode when it strikes a foe, inflicting conditions on nearby enemies. When fired above the heat threshold, launch additional walls.

optionalfeature.name: Particle Accelerator
entries: {@b Properties:} Exceed, Inflicts Cripple, Grants Swiftness
{@b Description:} Fire a crippling bolt of light at your target. Allies the bolt passes through are granted swiftness. Projectile velocity and damage increased while above the heat threshold.

optionalfeature.name: Prime Light Beam
entries: {@b Description:} Exceed. Charge up and fire an explosive beam of light in front of you. When activated above the heat threshold, this attack leaves behind a burning holographic field.

optionalfeature.name: Photon Projector

prerequisite.other: Access to the Holosmith Elite Specialization.

entries: Photon Forge replaces your tool belt skill 5. Gain access to Exceed skills.

optionalfeature.name: Light Density Amplifier
entries: Deactivate Photon Forge reduces incoming damage but has increased passive heat generation.

optionalfeature.name: Prismatic Converter
entries: Deactivate Photon Forge converts conditions into boons based on your heat level.

optionalfeature.name: Solar Focusing Lens
entries: Your first few attacks after entering or exiting Photon Forge inflict burning and deal increased strike damage. This bonus is also granted if you overheat.

optionalfeature.name: Heat Therapy

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Light Density Amplifier|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature Prismatic Converter|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature Solar Focusing Lens|GW2PoF}

entries: Gain health per unit of heat lost. This trait does not function while cooling due to an overheat unless Photonic Blasting Module is equipped.

optionalfeature.name: Crystal Configuration: Storm
entries: Photon Forge skill 1 now fires explosive projectiles, but generates extra heat.

optionalfeature.name: Crystal Configuration: Eclipse
entries: Corona Burst grants a barrier for each target struck.

optionalfeature.name: Crystal Configuration: Zephyr
entries: Holo Leap removes movement-impairing conditions, grants superspeed instead of swiftness, and inflicts cripple.

optionalfeature.name: Laser's Edge

prerequisite.other: {@optfeature Crystal Configuration: Storm|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature Crystal Configuration: Eclipse|GW2PoF} or {@optfeature Crystal Configuration: Zephyr|GW2PoF}

entries: While Photon Forge is active, your outgoing strike damage is increased based on your current heat.

optionalfeature.name: Thermal Release Valve
entries: Dodge rolling vents heat as an attack against nearby foes and grants vigor. (Attack will not occur without heat.)

optionalfeature.name: Enhanced Capacity Storage Unit
entries: Increases maximum heat capacity. While above 100% heat, periodically gain might. Some skills and traits gain additional heat tiers.

optionalfeature.name: Photonic Blasting Module
entries: Overheat now blasts damage to nearby foes and no longer deals its initial damage to you. The tool belt recharge penalty for Overheat is reduced. Heat can only be lost after overheating. Damage over time from Overheat is still applied.
